items.title: Logan Paul’s $5.3 million Pokémon bet raises a bigger question: Do collectibles belong in your portfolio?
items.description: Collectibles may offer eye-catching returns, but not all financial experts are on board.

items.title: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
items.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

items.title: How the New Year’s tax deadline poses a risk for gold, silver and the Dow
items.description: The right time for investors to make a move may be sooner than they think.

items.title: Too many people forgot their RMDs last year. Don’t make this ‘billion-dollar mistake.’
items.description: You have until Dec. 31 to take your required distribution. Consider this your wake-up call.

items.title: Here’s the setup for silver and gold heading into 2026
items.description: Also: Year-end tax and retirement planning advice and 2026 previews for semiconductor stocks, Tesla and bitcoin.
